data.title: Marvel Us Mondays
data.meta_description:
8 week Discipleship Program for ages 7-11
Ever Monday, September 11-November 6
data.text:
"Marvel Us Mondays" is an 8-week discipleship class for kids ages 7-11 that explores the incredible character of God through His awe-inspiring creations. Our aim is to inspire a deeper connection with God and His marvelous works while fostering friendships that will last a lifetime.

We will meet every Monday from Sept. 11 - Nov. 6 from 3:30 - 5:30 p.m. Activities include Discipleship, Plant and Animal Science, Art, Hiking, and Games.

Don't let your child miss out on this incredible journey of faith and discovery! Enroll now and watch your child's faith and understanding of God's creation grow like never before. Together, we'll embark on a journey of marvel and wonder!

Meeting Dates:

Sept. 11, 18, 25, Oct. 2, 9, 16, 23, 30, Nov. 6
